Immigration: This document has no bearing on immigration policy. Federalism: This is about foreign affairs, so federal control is inherent. National Security vs. Civil Liberties: This document doesn't touch upon these issues. Economic Regulation: The document involves government spending, but it's not about regulating the economy in a broader sense. Social Inclusion: This document is neutral on social inclusion. Therefore, most scores should be neutral.
